item.title: Photos from the Basilica of the National Shrine of the Immaculate Conception
item.description: <img src="/img/2016/10/nationalshrine.png" alt="nationalshrine"> <img src="/img/2016/10/nationalshrine1.png" alt="nationalshrine"> Recently visited the Basilica of the National Shrine and each time I visit this beautiful place I’m spellbound. It is one of the hidden gems to visit when you are visiting the capital. Here are some pictures from my recent visit. Click here for the photos from the Basilica of the National Shrine of the Immaculate Conception in Michigan Avenue, Washington, DC. The beautiful murals are a work of art!
